nodes.title: Today in court
nodes.description: After watching the trial today I can say that amber heards lawyers don’t know shit, they are asking stupid irrelevant questions about Johnny and so far the people they have questioned haven’t said anything bad about Johnny, they have nothing on him so they are just wasting everyone’s time

nodes.title: Johnny talking about captain jack sparrow
nodes.description:
Captain jack sparrow was a character that I had built from the ground up having added much of myself much of my own, rewriting the dialogue and the scenes and jokes I didn’t quite understand how after that long relationship and quite a successful relationship certainly for disney that suddenly I was guilty until proven innocent

Johnny Depp

nodes.title: Disney dropping Johnny depp
nodes.description: Johnny Depp has worked with Disney for so long and now all because of these stupid allegations against him they are dropping him and they don’t want to work with Johnny so they are making pirates of the Caribbean but with someone else, do they think that will work , the man who made all those movies and put his own magical touch to the characters he plays and brought to life, do they really think someone else can replace him because of amber heard, they just lost the best fuckin pirate and actor for an insane woman at the end of day they are going to regret their decision

nodes.title: Justice
nodes.description: There are  some people who support amber heard and it’s there opinion at the end of the day we can’t change that but everyone who is watching the trial can clearly see she doesn’t care about anything besides herself, You can see johnny depp in pain and how he just wants this to end, as a women myself it’s really shameful to see another women do something like this to a man when a man does domestic abuse on a women than everyone goes crazy and takes her side but if it’s the other way around they still blame the man like come on

nodes.title: Society justice for Johnny Depp
nodes.description: people just think that women are the ones that are in abusive relationships and the men are the ones behind them but that’s not always the case, men can be in an domestic abuse relationship, it goes both ways 50% of men are not guilty and 50% of women are not as well, it’s not that always the women is in an abusive relationship our society needs to stop and think about this and not just take one person”s side just because she is a women you don’t need to support her, first look at the facts and see, we need to realize that men can be in such relationships and they need support
